SRP.A: The peak of  Angel Investments is to the {right} of the peak of Peer-to-Peer Lending.

EVJ.A: The ridgeline representing {Real Estate} has the highest peak.

EVJ.Q: Which label has the highest density at X =2.0?
EVJ.A: At X =2.0,the label with the highest density is {Real Estate}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks exceed 6? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Real Estate}'s peak at {25},{Venture Capital}'s peak at {22},{Peer-to-Peer Lending}'s peak at {22},{Angel Investments}'s peak at {25}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks below 1? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Venture Capital or Angel Investments?
NC.A: {Angel Investments} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Real Estate or Venture Capital?
NC.A: {Real Estate} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.Q: How many ridges have their peak located to the right of the average X value across all ridges?
MSR.A: There are {4} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.

MSR.Q: What is the label of the ridge with the largest span along the mountain height?
MSR.A: The ridge with the largest span in the mountain height is {Real Estate}
